The base drop speed of the blocks. \nUnits: Lines/33 Milliseconds \nFrom 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 0.05)
The number of lines needed to clear to advance a level. \nUnits: Lines \nFrom 1 to Infinity (Default: 10)
The speed added to the base drop speed per level. \nUnits: Lines/33 Milliseconds \nFrom 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 0.025)

The frame rate of the game. 
Note: A faster frame rate increases the base drop speed of the blocks. 
Units: Frames/Second 
From 1 to 60 (Default: 30)
The sensitivity threshold of the flick gestures. \nUnits: Velocity of Swipe (Pixels/Detection Cycle) \nFrom 1 to Infinity (Default: 30)
The delay before a block locks in place. \nUnits: Milliseconds \nFrom 0 to Infinity (Default: 1000)
The drop speed of the block while soft dropping. \nUnits: Lines/Frame \nFrom 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 0.45)
The length needed to drag before the "drag gesture" is recognized. \nUnits: Pixels \nFrom 0 to Infinity (Default: 60)
The starting time of Time Attack. \nUnits: Seconds \nFrom 0 to Infinity (Default: 120)
App will be restart when you return to the previous screen.
Highly recommended. Works best on AMOLED screens.

Controls: 
	 Move Left/Right: Drag Left/Right 
	 Hard Drop: Swipe Down 
	 Soft Drop: Drag Down 
	 Hold Block: Swipe Up

Scoring: 
	 Base Points: 
		 Single: 100 
		 Double: 300 
		 Triple: 500 
		 Tetris: 800 
	 Base Twist (T-spin) Points: 
		 No Clear, Kicked: 100 
		 No Clear, Not Kicked: 400 
		 Single, Kicked: 200 
		 Single, Not Kicked: 800 
		 Double: 1200 
		 Triple: 1600 
	 Back to Back Tetris/Twist Clear: Base Points * 1.5 
	 Chaining: 50 * Chain #
